item.title: Machine Learning in computational materials science: an overview, a primer, and a rant.
item.description:
Description

An overview of the current trends in modern computational materials science and the cross-pollination with DataScience community. Iâ€™m going to present a few case studies and give a brief introduction of my own experience with using python in academic community.
item.dc:creator: Igor Mosyagin

item.title: Python in science: A case study
item.description:
Description

A short introduction on python adoption in scientific community given from the perspective of a PhD student in theoretical physics. Inevitably segueing towards why and how we should influence the current state.
item.dc:creator: Igor Mosyagin
